title: Evolutionary Biology: Time in the Field and Concerns with in the Field
description:
I chat with evolutionary biologist Colin Wright about his work with spiders, ants and wasps. We then discuss at length the changing definitions of gender and biological sex is the field of biology

Follow Colin on twitter @SwipeWright

Follow me here:

twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page

Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
